title: Pray Manuscript: Thank you Colin and David Mo
post: Recently, I said to Barrie that I really believe that an exchange of ideas, like we do on this blog, if it’s done honestly, can really be a good thing sometimes, because it forces you to reflect upon some other perspectives than yours and see things from another angle.  Often, something good can come out of this process, as long as you’re open enough to read an opinion that is far from yours and reflect seriously upon it.
